nl.tudelft.dnainator.javafx.widgets.animations

Class RightSlideAnimation

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.animation.Animation
      • javafx.animation.Transition
        • nl.tudelft.dnainator.javafx.widgets.animations.TransitionAnimation
          • nl.tudelft.dnainator.javafx.widgets.animations.SlidingAnimation
            • nl.tudelft.dnainator.javafx.widgets.animations.RightSlideAnimation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CustomAnimation

    public class RightSlideAnimation
extends SlidingAnimation
    The RightSlideAnimation is a SlidingAnimation that transitions to the right.

                           double size,
                           double duration,
                           TransitionAnimation.Position pos)
        Construct a new RightSlideAnimation, which will animate a sliding transition to the right.
        Parameters:
        pane - The Pane to be animated.
        size - The size over which the animation will occur.
        duration - The duration of the animation.
        pos - The position of the Pane.
